# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  func_error.cir func_error.cir.sh func_error.cir.tags func_loop.cir func_param.cir tags func_error.cir.options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/func_error.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_error.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} func_error.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} func_error.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_error.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_error.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;errorexit")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_error.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} func_error.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} func_error.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_error.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_error.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;errorexit")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_loop.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} func_loop.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_loop.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_loop.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP func_loop.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_loop.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} func_loop.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_loop.cir.prn func_loop.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_loop.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED func_loop.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_loop.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_param.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} func_param.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_param.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_param.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP func_param.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_param.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} func_param.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_param.cir.prn func_param.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_param.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED func_param.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_21_SON/func_param.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial")
endif()
